content: the summer lace wavy cami knitting pattern is designed from the beautiful vintage feather and fan lace design the lace is worked seamlessly from the bottom up and creates a delicate wavy texture that is perfect for the warm summer days &nbsp the written pattern can be found on my website https //fridayknits com/blogs/free-pattern/summer-lace-wavy-top-knitting-pattern and the video tutorial can be found on youtube https //youtu be/ppotyrt0vzo
